original_title: Darius Rucker Live At Red Rocks 2013
overview: Rucker’s True Believers Tour comes in support of his True Believers album, due in stores on May 21. The album features current hit single, “Wagon Wheel,” as well as collaborations with Sheryl Crow, Dave Haywood, Charles Kelley and Hillary Scott. True Believers is Rucker’s third studio country album, which follows the success of his debut Learn To Live and Charleston, SC 1966.
title: Darius Rucker Live At Red Rocks 2013
